name: Unearthing Process
description: Once upon a time, a young boy headed with his father, who was a professional miner, towards the depth of the Earth, to search for gems, such as diamonds, emeralds and gold. The young boy fell down in that moment, and his father was extremely astonished by the depth of the gap.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP to Windows 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP to Windows 10 Storage: 350 MB available space
